holidays.title: Kiss a Ginger Day
holidays.description: Red hair is slowly disappearing around the world, so kiss a ginger while you still can!

holidays.title: National Pharmacist Day
holidays.description: The importance of pharmacists is honored how they impact our health and well-being.

holidays.title: Feast of Fabulous Wild Men Day
holidays.description: An ode to eye candy in the form of male homo sapiens.

holidays.title: Healthy Weight, Healthy Look Day
holidays.description: Beef up or cut down on those carbs, and put in some gym time too.

holidays.title: National Curried Chicken Day
holidays.description: Dive in, fork first, as we celebrate one of the most delicious types of chicken dishes.

holidays.title: National Hot Tea Day
holidays.description: A cup of tea for breakfast, lunch, and dinner is never too much on this day.

holidays.title: National Kettlebell Day
holidays.description: Dive into kettlebell’s history, enjoy some fun facts, and check out ways to celebrate this day.

holidays.title: National Marzipan Day
holidays.description: It’s time to celebrate and bite your teeth into this delicious confectionary.

holidays.title: National Youth Day
holidays.description: Today, Indians honor the birthday of Swami Vivekananda, one of India’s greatest spiritual and social leaders.

holidays.title: Remembrance Day
holidays.description: Learn the best ways to observe Remembrance Day and pay tribute to the lives lost.

holidays.title: Stick to Your New Year's Resolution Day
holidays.description: New Year, same old you? Here’s how you can change things up.

holidays.title: Work Harder Day
holidays.description: Invest more energy, and put in more effort. Be resolute and achieve success. Cheers to you!

holidays.title: Do Kyungsoo’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented South Korean actor and singer, the climb to stardom has only just begun.

holidays.title: Howard Stern’s Birthday
holidays.description: Stern has certainly paved his own way to fame with his natural entertaining personality!

holidays.title: Issa Rae’s Birthday
holidays.description: There are no limits to ambition for this award-winning actress, best-selling author, and businesswoman!

holidays.title: Jeff Bezos’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn about his extraordinary journey and how an idea born from the garage reached every household!

holidays.title: Rob Zombie’s Birthday
holidays.description: There are no limits to Rob Zombie’s inspiration when it comes to creating all things horror!

holidays.title: Zayn Malik’s Birthday
holidays.description: Discover everything there is to know about the heartthrob English pop singer, songwriter, and model.
